comment.author: 53058912@N07
comment._content: Congratulations! Your photo has received the Amber Award from FotoVotr. It has been selected from the Flickr community because of its interest and popularity. For more information, please visit the FotoVotr Amber Group. We would be honored to have you join us!

comment.author: 11777699@N00
comment._content: Effektiv egenpropaganda fra Nasjonalbiblioteket! De har lurt inn tidligere nasjonalbibliotekar og statsråd Bendik Rugaas som nisse nr. 1 fra høyre
